column5: Could some sudgest what mix would be required for a old 6hp tiller outboard motor I just picked up? Year is 1980-82? Thank you! Twister
I believe that yours is a 1969, Twister. Google "Johnson outboard serial numbers". It'll give you the info.
Here's some info....  http://forums.iboats.com/showthread.php?t=80541  I concur with Roy at this point....any search for 6R-69M pulls up 1969 6hp Johnson.
Thanks for your help guys as I know I could count on you!
Yes the motor is a 1969. Ratio is 50:1 with TC-W3 outboard oil and 87 octane gas.
